Face 1: Square Base Create the first loop (loop 1) of the square base with the following lines: * Line 1: Starting point [0.0, 0.0], ending point [0.75, 0.0] * Line 2: Starting point [0.75, 0.0], ending point [0.75, 0.75] * Line 3: Starting point [0.75, 0.75], ending point [0.0, 0.75] * Line 4: Starting point [0.0, 0.75], ending point [0.0, 0.0] Face 2: Square Top Create the second loop (loop 2) of the square top with the following lines: * Line 1: Starting point [0.0886, 0.0886], ending point [0.6614, 0.0886] * Line 2: Starting point [0.6614, 0.0886], ending point [0.6614, 0.6614] * Line 3: Starting point [0.6614, 0.6614], ending point [0.0886, 0.6614] * Line 4: Starting point [0.0886, 0.6614], ending point [0.0886, 0.0886] The height, width, and length of part 1 are: * Height: 0.1476 * Width: 0.75 * Length: 0.75 Extrude the sketch by 0.1476 units in the positive Z direction (towards the normal). The description of the part is as follows: * Shape: A 3D model of a rectangular prism with a square base and a square top, connected by a rectangular side. * Length: 0.75 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.1476 The operation is a New Body Feature Operation, meaning this part is the first part and will not interact with any other parts.</description>

prompt: <description>**Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism** The first part to construct is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.
